summary: In mijn werk als senior onderzoeker bij het lectoraat Armoede Interventies zet ik mij in om gedragswetenschappelijke inzichten toe te passen in de bestrijding van armoede in Nederland. Als lectoraat doen wij dat samen met onze partners, waaronder woningcorporaties,  gemeentes en maatschappelijk dienstverleners. Ook in het onderwijs van de Hogeschool krijgen onze kennis en vaardigheden een plek: studenten lopen met ons mee in onderzoek en we verwerken onze inzichten in les programma's.

profile_positions.description: Voor het lectoraat Armoede Interventies voer ik een onderzoek uit naar armoede, de oorzaken en gevolgen daarvan. Samen met professionals in het sociaal domein werk ik aan duurzame oplossingen voor armoede vraagstukken.
profile_positions.title: Senior Researcher

profile_positions.description: I am working at the UMC St Radboud. Along with others I conduct a cohort study, where we explore the effects of a person cenetered approach of care for homeless people. We want to know if the care increases the quality of life and whether changes occur in the living situation of homeless people.
profile_positions.title: PhD student at UMC St Radboud
Master student at Social Policy and Social Interventions

company.name: NDLOVU CARE GROUP (t/a NDLOVU MEDICAL TRUST)

profile_positions.company: NDLOVU CARE GROUP (t/a NDLOVU MEDICAL TRUST)
profile_positions.description: At the Ndlovu care group I set up an exploratory study on the possibilities to implement a new pre-school programme for vulnerable children in a township, which has led to the further development of a pre-school intervention programme and an evaluation and monitoring research line.
profile_positions.title: research internship

profile_positions.description: Assisting on the annual monitor of the Social Relief Plan (2009).
profile_positions.title: Research assistant

profile_positions.description:
During an intensive and short period I have been exploring the possibilities of starting of a workshop company together with Hanneke Goossen en Ingrid Raaijmakers. The aim was to develop a workshop for graduate students and starters at the jobmarket, who want to explore their talents and motivations for future job perspectives.

It turned out that it was very difficult to make this feasible in financial respect. Also, it turned out that there are aspects of having a company that I did not enjoy, such as the need for marketing. In the end it just cost me more energy that I got from it and it. The same hold true for Haneke and Ingrid, therefore we decided to end HIJ Startcoach.
profile_positions.title: Trainer at HIJ Startcoach

profile_positions.description: During an introduction course on social psychology I supervised students in writing a paper on effectiveness of comercials
profile_positions.title: Teacher of social psychology

profile_positions.description: Teaching the basics of statistics to first year psychology students at Utrecht University
profile_positions.title: Teacher of statistics

profile_positions.description: During the open days of the university I supervise students who
profile_positions.title: supervisor voorlichtingsdagen

profile_positions.description:
At AEGEE-Utrecht, we developed a projected named Destination Europe. The aim of this project was to make young people aware of the life of illegal boat immigrants from Africa. We tried to show youngsters why some Africans want to come to Europe and how life is like for them. We zoomed in on how life was before coming here in Europe, what the journey was like and how life is here. 
We did not want to impose our own opinion, but we wanted to make young people aware and most importantly, motivate them to put oneself in the shoes of these immigrants and think about what they would do in their position. On this way, we hope to promote understanding and tolerance.
We did this by organizing all kinds of activities, such as interviewing and photographing Africans how are trying to get to Europe or arived here, workshops and vistis to an asylum centre, guest lessons, a manifestation, debates and movie nights. 
The website for the project is; http://www.elgersma.info/destinationeurope/
profile_positions.title: project developer for Destination Europe

profile_positions.description: AEGEE has a long tradition of organizing Summer Universities each summer. These two weeks during programs are held in different places though Europe and students from all over Europe are welcome to participate. The aim is to bring student from different countries together and thereby reduce prejudice and stimulate tolerance. During the Summer University of 2006 in Utrecht & Amsterdam I was responsible for the logistics. This includes finding accomodation, transportation, arranging meals, etc.
profile_positions.title: Organizer of Summer University
